Docs.summary: Maps the configuration file virtual and physical paths.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Configuration.IConfigMapPathFactory> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.Configuration.IConfigMapPath Create(string virtualPath, string physicalPath) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates the interface for the mapping between configuration-file virtual and physical paths.
Docs.returns: The object associated with the specified configuration-file path mapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Configuration.IConfigMapPathFactory.Create%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
